overview: It is a piece of witness of cool blood killing in Myanmar. In February 1, 2021, Burmeseâ€™s military seized power and detained State Counsellor Daw Aung San Suu Kyi and President U Win Myint and elected government members. After the coup, Young Burmese called 'Drum Revolution' group came out on the street and protested the military junta. The junta brutally crack downed on peaceful protesters.
title: Strike with the Beat
